long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Navigating the web can be overwhelming, especially if you live with vision challenges, color blindness, or dyslexia. We understand these struggles and are here to help. Our Chrome extension is thoughtfully designed to make the digital world more accessible, ensuring every web page adapts to your needs with ease and comfort.

With features like colorblind modes, Open Dyslexic font (proven to help readability for dyslexic people), high-contrast settings, customizable fonts, text spacing adjustments, and more, this extension makes the web inclusive and easier to use for all.
Our extension offers:

-     Colorblind Modes for protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia, and achromatopsia. These filters enhance color distinction, making visual elements like graphs, buttons, images, and videos more accessible.

-     High-Contrast Mode: converting web pages to black text on a white background, reducing eye strain and improving readability.
Font Customization: including the dyslexia-friendly OpenDyslexic font, along with Georgia and Arial for a smoother reading experience.

-     Adjustable Text Settings, allowing you to modify font size, line spacing, and letter spacing to suit your preferences.
Ad Remover to reduce visual clutter and streamline your browsing experience.

We’ve also included a Save Preferences Form for ultimate convenience. Here’s how it works:

-     Set your preferred font, colorblind mode, and visual adjustments once.

-     Automatically apply these preferences to every website you visit.

-     Easily toggle features on or off as needed for flexibility.

This extension is designed with care for:

-     Seniors who find reading online challenging.

-     Individuals with visual impairments needing a clearer, more comfortable web experience.

-     People with dyslexia seeking tools to enhance reading fluency and reduce frustration.

-     Anyone with color blindness looking to better interpret visual content online.

We’re dedicated to making the internet a more inclusive place. Whether you’re staying connected with family, exploring new interests, or simply browsing the news, this extension empowers you to navigate the web with confidence and comfort. Download Web Accessibility Helper by Ensquire today and rediscover the web on your terms.

If you have any questions or feedback, we’re here to support you. Together, we can make your online experience not just accessible, but enjoyable.
